Trigger.Name: Thermionic Beam -> Iron Chariot

## README - UCOB IMAGE AURAS
Trigger.Description:
README
- Setup Steps for UCOB Triggers
1 - Copy the trigger "# UCOB Settings" in your startup folder
2 - Edit the Settings Trigger
3 - Edit the Image action and click on "use visual guide for placement"
4 - Right click on the image and "Save Changes" once it is where you want it
5 - Well Done !
FAQ : "What is the startup folder ???" - Read this install guide : https://github.com/Aho-Senpai/Aho-Triggers/blob/main/Triggernometry/README/RaidBuffs-Repo-README.md

Trigger.Name: Inferno Howl
Trigger.RegularExpression: Ifrit starts using Inferno Howl on (?<char>[a-zA-Z*]*)

Trigger.Name: Homing Lasers
Trigger.RegularExpression: The Ultima Weapon readies Homing Lasers

Trigger.Name: Diffractive Laser
Trigger.RegularExpression: The Ultima Weapon uses Diffractive Laser

Trigger.Name: $$README: V1.30$$ New Test macros in description.
Trigger.Description:
https://github.com/KingPendragoon/FFXIVJobPrioGaolAutoMarker/blob/main/README.md
Gaol V1.28 Please make sure that Default party sort is enabled in FF (Tank, Healer, DPS) and that in triggernometry it is configured under "Options > Edit Configuration > FInal Fantasy XIV" that player list set to "Custom Order" and is in the proper order as well of Tanks, Healers, DPS.
The following Macros will need to be created and added to the F1-F9 keys F1: /mk attack <1> F2: /mk attack <2> F3: /mk attack <3> F4: /mk attack <4> F5: /mk attack <5> F6: /mk attack <6> F7: /mk attack <7> F8: /mk attack <8>
F9 /mk clear <1> /mk clear <2> /mk clear <3> /mk clear <4> /mk clear <5> /mk clear <6> /mk clear <7> /mk clear <8>
If you want to test if the plugin works before you reach the fight by running those echo's you will need to make a macro with the following text and replace Name1-Name3 with the players name. Make sure the line ends with a colon : /e Titan|2B6C|Rock Throw|88888888|<1>| /e Titan|2B6C|Rock Throw|88888888|<4>| /e Titan|2B6C|Rock Throw|88888888|<6>|
If you wish to edit the priority list you will need to go into each of the triggers Job1Priority-Job3Priority and change the numbers assigned to them there MNK: 01 DRG: 02 NIN: 03 SAM: 04 PLD: 05 WAR: 06 DRK: 07 GNB: 08 BRD: 09 MCH: 10 DNC: 11 BLM: 12 SMN: 13 RDM: 14 WHM: 15 SCH: 16 AST:17

Folder.Name: TEA No Zone Lock (Ayas Fate Calibration)

Action.Description: Save your own clone's ID in variable cloneID
Fate Calibration Header (Move me!) | Toggle to enable/disable images
Set FateAB variable for Fate Projection Î±
Set FateAB variable for Fate Projection Î²
Sort clonelist after list has been made
Fire Clone TTS Trigger if variables are sufficient
Fire Clone Image Trigger if variables are sufficient
Unset obsolete scalar variables at Fate Calibration cast finish
Unset clonelist at Fate Calibration cast finish
Deactivate images at real Sacrament/Radiant Sacrament

Action.UseTTSTextExpression: Ne vous empilez pas avec de l'eau.

Trigger.Name: Compressed Duration !AURA!
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:[A-F0-9]{8}:(?<player>[a-zA-Z-' ]{1,31}) gains the effect of Compressed (?<debuff>Lightning|Water) from (.*?)? for (?<duration>[0-9]{2})\.00 Seconds
